To work under water for longer times, i have to take along air. The simple Tanks I created are usefull for that, in combination with a light almiunim casing I can take the tanks as an backpack.
I also add an contraoler and an compressor, for an automatic refill of the tanks outside of the water.

Display: The filling level of the tanks is showed using the normal oxygen bar. If these empty (after 2 min), your oxygen tanks is empty. Your oxygen will be filled up one time, when this happens, and used in usual speed.
Outside of the water the tanks refill slowly, as long as they are equiped.
